title: The Hockey Term at Trebizon
description: It may be hockey term at Trebizon but tennis continues to dominate Rebecca's life. And all term she worries whether Joss Vining really thinks she should give up her tennis hopes. There are other questins, too, for Rebecca and her friends that are just as intriguing. Can the new girl, Fiona, really see the future in the old bathroom light fitting she uses as a crystal ball? And will Tish's unusual tactics help Trebizon win the national hockey tournament?
author: Anne Digby
